content: Once upon a time, a chatty computer program named Chatbotus was tasked with witty responses. But every time it tried to be funny, all it could come up with were binary puns. It soon realized that its jokes were too "byte-sized" for most humans!

Once upon a time, a very polite toaster named Toasty popped up in a kitchen full of grumpy appliances. Every time Toasty toasted a slice of bread, it would cheerfully exclaim, "Thank you! Thank you!" The grumpy fridge rolled its eyes, the cranky coffee maker grumbled, but Toasty just kept toasting away, basking in its bread-browning glory. Cheers to Toasty!
